page.title: 18THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: The Women's Institute has been in existence for nearly thirty years. The membership comes from Therfield, Kelshall and Reed and at present there are approximately thirty members. It is a National organisation with a Headquarters in London and regional bases in every County.Each month members meet at Fordham Hall with speakers on a variety of subjects ranging from Cookery through Travel and Legal Matters to Public Affairs. Other outings are arranged throughout the year and the Institute participates in Group and County activities. The Institute is a good meeting place for all ages and walks of life to join together. Funds are raised by subscription annually and by money-raising events.
